---
title: "Alexandra Bannach-Brown"
---

My name is Alexandra. I am post-doctoral research fellow at the Institute for Evidence-Based Practice at Bond University with expertise and interests in evidence synthesis, open science and the automation of systematic reviews.


My research involves developing and implementing automation tools to reduce waste in healthcare and biomedical research and improve research quality.
